title.narrative: Hunan Forest Restoration and Development Project

description.narrative: The project development objective is to enhance the resilience and environmental function of selected ice storm affected ecologicalforest plantations in Hunan Province by increasing forest species diversity and vegetative tree cover in those areas.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Financial Management | Description :The Project Implementing Entity shall maintain a financial management systemand prepare financial statements in accordance with consistently applied accounting standards acceptable to the Bank, both in amanner adequate to reflect the operations and financial conditions of the Project Implementing Entity, including the operations,resources and expenditures related to the Project. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Institutional Arrangements | Description :Throughout the period of implementation of the project, Hunan shallmaintain Provincial and County Leading Groups, Provincial and County Project Management Offices, as well as a technical supportteam with terms of reference, staffing and other resources acceptable to the Bank. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Procurement Management | Description :All goods, works and services required for the Project and to be financedout of the proceeds of the Loan shall be procured in accordance with the provisions the Project Agreement and Procurement Plan. |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Manual | Description :The Project Implementing Entity shall carry out the Project inaccordance with the Project Implementation Plan and shall not amend,suspend, or waive the said plan or any part thereof without theprior written agreement of the World Bank (the Bank). | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Project Monitoring, Reporting, Evaluation | Description :The Project Implementing Entity shall monitor andevaluate the progress of the Project and prepare Project Reports in accordance with the indicators set forth in the ProjectImplementation Plan. Each Project Progress Report shall cover the period of one calendarsemester, and shall be furnished to theBank not later than two months after the end of the period covered by such report. | Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Safeguards Instruments | Description :The Project Implementing Entity shall implement the EnvironmentalManagement Plan (EMP, including therein the Environmental Protection Guidelines and the Pest Management Plan) and the EthnicMinorities Development Plan (EMDP) in a manner and substance satisfactory to the Bank, and shall not, amend, suspend, or waive theEMP and the EMDP without the prior written concurrence of the Bank. | Frequency :Yearly

title.narrative: b. Number of workshops undertaken to disseminate project experience in applying technical models among project and non-project staff/counties.
a. Number of on-going research programs.
Govt institutions provided w/ capacity buildg to improve mgt of forest resources
Number of upgraded nurseries which are able to produce high quality seedlings of indigenous species.
Areas with damaged forests which are partially replanted with multiple species
Forest Cooperatives:Number of forest cooperatives established or strengthened with their operational plans completed
Forest users trained - Ethnic minority/indigenous people
Areas with damaged forests which forest resilience is attained through natural tree regeneration, land treatments and multi-speciespartial replanting
Number of seedlings produced for project reforestation and rehabilitation. (million)
Diversity of species and tree structures in replanted/rehabilitated forests increased to improve forest resilience: Number of species introduced by the project in all sites
(i) In naturally regenerated forests with treatment (percentage)
Project Management and Institutional Development: Fully staffed & functional PPMO & CPMOs kept during project period
